languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на вас взгляд, полный презрения.{/n} "Их смерть {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}не оправдывает{/d} убийство еще стольких же невинных слуг {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на вас взгляд, полный презрения.{/n} "Их смерть не оправдывает убийство еще стольких же невинных слуг {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, Вольный Торговец".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix casts you a scorn-filled look.{/n} "Their deaths {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}do not justify{/d} the murder of even more innocent servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, Rogue Trader."

languages.text: {n}海因里希向你投来了充满鄙夷的目光。{/n}“就算那些人真的白白丧命，也{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}不能证明{/d}杀害更多的{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}子民属于正当行为，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts you a scorn-filled look.{/n} "Their deaths {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}do not justify{/d} the murder of even more innocent servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希向你投来了充满鄙夷的目光。{/n}“就算那些人真的白白丧命，也不能证明杀害更多的{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}子民属于正当行为，行商浪人。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te lanza una mirada cargada de desprecio.{/n} «Sus muertes {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}no justifican{/d} el asesinato de aún más súbditos inocentes del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, Comerciante».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts you a scorn-filled look.{/n} "Their deaths {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}do not justify{/d} the murder of even more innocent servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te lanza una mirada cargada de desprecio.{/n} «Sus muertes no justifican el asesinato de aún más súbditos inocentes del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, Comerciante».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは軽蔑のまなざしを向ける。{/n}「自由開拓者、彼らの死は、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の無垢な奴隷の殺害を{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}正当化するものではありません{/d}」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts you a scorn-filled look.{/n} "Their deaths {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}do not justify{/d} the murder of even more innocent servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは軽蔑のまなざしを向ける。{/n}「自由開拓者、彼らの死は、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の無垢な奴隷の殺害を{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}正当化するものではありません{/d}」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix wirft dir einen Blick voller Verachtung zu.{/n} "Ihr Tod {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}rechtfertigt nicht{/d} den Mord an auch nur einem weiteren unschuldigen Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts you a scorn-filled look.{/n} "Their deaths {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}do not justify{/d} the murder of even more innocent servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix wirft dir einen Blick voller Verachtung zu.{/n} "Ihr Tod rechtfertigt nicht den Mord an auch nur einem weiteren unschuldigen Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard méprisant.{/n} « Leur mort {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}ne justifie pas{/d} le massacre d'autres serviteurs innocents de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts you a scorn-filled look.{/n} "Their deaths {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}do not justify{/d} the murder of even more innocent servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard méprisant.{/n} « Leur mort ne justifie pas le massacre d'autres serviteurs innocents de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, küçümseyen gözleriyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Ölmesinler diye daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} hizmetkârının ölümüne {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}sebep olamayız{/d} Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts you a scorn-filled look.{/n} "Their deaths {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}do not justify{/d} the murder of even more innocent servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}“Heinrix, küçümseyen gözleriyle sana bakıyor.{/n} “Ölümleri, daha çok {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} hizmetkârını öldürmek için bir sebep değil Hür Tacir.”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
